name: Catches Win Matches !
description:
A 3D Cricket Game-(Cricket Game very similar to baseball).

The game starts with a situation in a match. The player controls fielders that take catches, execute runouts so as to win the match.  

Controls

  • Use the Slider to select fielders
  • Arrow keys to move the player. 
  • Once the fielder has the ball use the "Throw Button" or Space Key to throw the ball back. 

ENJOY !!
